roleset.name: prohibit, prevent
roleset.note: ENJOIN-V NOTES: Args 2 and 3 are predicted from 'prohibit' but may or may not occurwith enjoin. (from enjoin.01-v)

role.descr: secondary predication on arg1 or action

example.name: just transitive
example.text: The FTC said it-1 would seek *trace*-1 to enjoin the proposed acquisition in a federal trial court, but declined to specify which one.
